issue.title: Traffic shaping seems to break ros connection between FC and SIM

content.raw: I found IP filtering wasn't working last night after responding to another thread and made some tweaks. It was also applying network restrictions between the Sim and FC link. I wonder if that's the problem. Just making sure the version you're using is the same as the one in the [pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/cloudsim-sim/pull-requests/61/add-latency-to-traffic-shapper/diff) now (commit [d98623f](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/cloudsim-sim/commits/d98623fb3495bb2201bb67e1bcb5e31855a07512))
content.html: I found IP filtering wasn't working last night after responding to another thread and made some tweaks. It was also applying network restrictions between the Sim and FC link. I wonder if that's the problem. Just making sure the version you're using is the same as the one in the pull request now (commit d98623f)
